desc: Based out of Los Angeles, our Custom Food Carts are perfect for your next business venture. Whether you're looking to open up a halal, hot dog, Japanese, tamal or other type of food cart, we have the perfect cart for you.

layout.text: Follow the Revolution. Introducing the first ever sidewalk vending compliant Tamale Cart in LA County, "The Tamalero". Precision lightweight design, affordable & built for the everyday street vendor.
